page.title: 16HOYLANDSWAINE VILLAGE HALL
page.content: The{village hall}at{Hoylanswaine}used to be the old Sunday School but it is now used for many village activities. {Discos}are sometimes held there. They are usually held on Friday.There are always quite a lot of people that go. There is usually a supper such as hotdogs or hamburger. The disco starts about 7 o'clock and finishes about 9 o'clock. The{youth club}is held on Thursday at 6 o'clock at the village hall. We have three{youth club}leaders. Every week we make somthing like buns. Sometimes we go{swimming}at{Stocksbridge}or {Rotherham}and{ice skating}at {Sheffield. Sometimes we have{bingo}in the village hall. It is held about once every two months.{Bingo}is good because when you win you always get a good prize.
